document.full_text: the united nations on thursday confirmed 34 people have been found dead at an iranian dissident camp in iraq after iraqi security forces moved against the camp last week.
document.title: u.n. confirms 34 dead at iranian camp in iraq
lines_and_colors: the united nations on thursday confirmed 34 people have been found dead at an iranian dissident camp in iraq after iraqi security forces moved against the camp last week.
